PROJECT(${QUAZIP_LIBRARY})

SET(SOURCES JlCompress.cpp 
  qioapi.cpp 
  quaadler32.cpp 
  quacrc32.cpp 
  quagzipfile.cpp 
  quaziodevice.cpp 
  quazip.cpp 
  quazipdir.cpp 
  quazipfile.cpp 
  quazipnewinfo.cpp 
  quazipfileinfo.cpp
  unzip.c 
  zip.c
)

SET(HEADERS zcrypt.h
  ioapi.h
  JlCompress.h
  quaadler32.h
  quachecksum32.h
  quacrc32.h
  quagzipfile.h
  quaziodevice.h
  quazipdir.h
  quazipfile.h
  quazipfileinfo.h
  quazip_global.h
  quazip.h
  quazipnewinfo.h
)
  
ADD_LIBRARY(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME} Qt5::Core)
